name: Boat Warfare
description:
You play as a hacked unmanned boat controlled from a Unified Territories of Acirema airplane that is on a stealth mission to destroy the Anihc's port military base and steal their military strategies database before they can attack first.

Play through 4 exciting levels and experience the story of a lifetime! Fight through the sewers and into the open ocean in this thrilling action adventure with radio commentary from exciting characters like Radio Guy and Pilot. Battle against an evil country that is hell bent on destroying the nation of Acirema and its allies.
